articles.title: A big asteroid is coming close to Earth. Be excited, not afraid. - The Washington Post
articles.description: To be clear, the asteroid is not going to hit Earth — not in our lifetime nor our children’s lifetimes, anyway.

articles.title: The moon and Venus join close together in the night sky Aug. 5 - Space.com
articles.description: Of all of the monthly meetings between the moon and Venus this year, this one is by far the closest. The only caveat is that the pair won't be very high, as the dynamic duo sets just one hour after the sun.
